title: Constant 500 - 700 MS.
body: Best internet I can have but my ping still is shit I'm pretty sure it's not about my internet please help me.

replies.body:
Hey there! I have had this issue before and RIots connection KB fixed me right up. Here's that link, https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues I'm going be on here so if that doesn't work feel free to reach out to me.  

{{champion:25}} {{summoner:4}} {{item:3157}}
